pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:0.5: 81. The training rule on what is expired
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.3: had gathered a group of senior monks, intending to give the full admission to a trainee nun. But after seeing much staple and non-staple food, she dismissed the senior monks, saying,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.4: “Venerables, I won’t give the full admission to the trainee nun just yet.” She then gathered Devadatta, Kokālika, Kaṭamodakatissaka, Khaṇḍadeviyāputta, and Samuddadatta, and gave the full admission to that trainee nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.5: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.6: “How could Venerable Thullanandā give the full admission to a trainee nun, when the given consent had expired?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.7: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.10: “… How could the nun Thullanandā do this?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.11: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.12: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:1.13.1: ‘If, when any given consent has expired, a nun gives the full admission to a trainee nun, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.5: When any given consent has expired:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.8: one who has trained for two years in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.11: If, intending to give the full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.12: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.13: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.14: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.1.15: and the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.2.2: if she gives her the full admission while the gathering has not yet left;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.2.4: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc81:2.2.5: The eleventh training rule is finished.
